item.title: S-A Wallstreetbets
item.description: Semantic analysis on wallstreetbets using VADER and Mixed-Effect model. This project was my bachelor thesis. It was an idea I developed by myself following the big fuzz around Reddit’s wallstreetbets and their opposition towards a short position regarding the stock GME. I conducted semantic analysis on the comments from the most discussed threads using VADER, for a period of 15 days. I also retrieved information about the traded volume of the mentioned stocks over the same period of time.

item.title: Website
item.description: This website was something I created with Hugo. I wanted to broaden my expertise and this seemed was a great way to produce something usefull as well as making me more aquainted with: Github Static websites Markdown Servers and Domains
